Please help improve it by replacing them with more appropriate citations to reliable, independent sources. *(August 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Award The **Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct** (**10 Years**) **Medal** is a [decoration](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) awarded to a member of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) (SAF) who has completed 10 years of continuous service. For [NSmen](/wiki/NSmen), reservists qualify for the equivalent [Singapore Armed Forces National Service Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_National_Service_Medal). A clasp is awarded for an additional 5 years of service, for a total of 15 years. ## Description - The ribbon is brown, with three central white stripes. ## Service medals In the SAF, the medals for service are: - 5 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Good Service Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Good_Service_Medal) - 10 years - Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (10 Years) Medal - 15 years - Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (10 Years) Medal with 15 year clasp - 20 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (20 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(20_Years)_Medal) - 25 years - [Long Service Medal (Military)](/wiki/Long_Service_Medal_(Military)_(Singapore)) - 30 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (20 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(20_Years)_Medal) with 30 year clasp - Singapore MINDEF Factsheet: Review of SAF medals - Singaporean Army Medals Factsheet - [Singaporean orders and decorations](/wiki/Singaporean_orders_and_decorations) This Singapore-related article is a stub.
